elements.name: crmOrgId
elements.label: CRM Organization Unique Name
elements.toolTip: You can find your organization's unique name by navigating to Advanced Settings on your Dynamics organization. Then navigate to Customizations > Developer Resources.

elements.name: DeploySimulator
elements.label: Deploy Simulator (optional)
elements.toolTip: Deploying this will help you simulate an IoT device to help you test our various flows in Connected Field Service.

elements.name: isTimeSeriesInsight
elements.label: Deploy Azure Time Series Insights (optional)
elements.toolTip: Time Series Insights can be included in your deployment to provide you with IoT device insights and analytics.

elements.name: ObjectID
elements.label: Object ID
elements.toolTip: To get Object ID, Go to Azure Active Directory > Enterprise applications > Search Application by Name > Copy Object ID

elements.name: isPowerBI
elements.label: Deploy SQL Server for Power BI (optional)
elements.toolTip: Power BI can help you analyze aggregate data accross all your IoT devices in a single view. Deploying PowerBI will also deploy two additional resources: Azure Stream Analytics and SQL Server database.

options.text: Enter the new username and password for creating the database.

elements.name: administratorLogin
elements.label: SQL Server admin username
elements.toolTip: Make sure your login name meets the following requirements - It's a SQL Identifier, and not a typical system name (like admin, administrator, sa, root, dbmanager, loginmanager, etc.), or a built-in database user or role (like dbo, guest, public, etc.). Make sure your name doesn't contain whitespaces, unicode characters, or nonalphabetic characters, and that it doesn't begin with numbers or symbols.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

elements.name: administratorLoginPassword
elements.toolTip: Your password cannot contain all or part of the username. Part of a username is defined as three or more consecutive alphanumeric characters.

constraints.customValidationMessage: Your password cannot contain all or part of the username. Part of a username is defined as three or more consecutive alphanumeric characters.
